name: Maimai Murasaki Plus
summary:
An expanded update to maimai MURASAKi, released in Japan, Singapore and Indonesia.

General changes:
- Score names have changed from half-width to full-width rotation.
- Event Course received a large overhaul, with the system being changed from a number of plays style system to a stamp card one.
- Some Event Courses can now award maiZENNY as well.
- Otohime's Room (乙姫の部屋) has been added. At the end of a credit, the player can choose to gift maiZENNY to Otohime. Some Collection items will be rewarded according to the gifted amount.
- Challenge Track will no longer appear if a player has a Rating lower than 7.00, except when playing with another player with a Rating higher than 7.00.
- Added "MASTER unreleased" display.
- Added Collection random SET function, which will choose random items from your collection.
- Ranking display by store/prefecture has been removed, now only displaying the whole country.
- Re:MASTER charts return, after being briefly suspended in MURASAKi.
